段: 一个啦呼，講新婦不孝大家啦，啊，娶一个新，彼新婦擱娶新婦啦。啊伊貯飯，貯糜去予，大家食，驚這个新婦知影啦。

chit8 e5 lah honnh, kong2 sim-pu7 put-hau3 tai7-ke lah, a, chhoa7 chit8 e5 sin, in he sim-pu7 koh chhoa7 sim-pu7 lah. a i toe2 png7, toe2 be5 khi3 hou7 in, in tai7-ke chiah8, kiann in chit e5 sim-pu7 chai-iann2 lah.
自安呢問厝邊啦，講：「阮大家仔那會定定貯糜去彼稻埕尾卜創啥貨？」安呢啦。
chu7 an2-ni mng7 in chhu3-pinn lah, kong2:  “goan2 tai7-ke-a2 na2 e7 tiann7-tiann7 toe2 be5 khi3 he tiu7-tiann5-be2 beh chhong3 siann2-hoe3?” an2-ni lah.
啊彼厝邊講：「恁一个阿媽佇彼啊。」安呢啦。
a hit chhu3-pinn kong2: “lin2 chit8 e5 a-ma2 ti7 hia ah.” an2-ni lah.
啊伊就叫阿媽，自安呢新……大家無佇底，伊自安呢去尋阿媽啦，共阿媽負轉來洗身軀啦，呼，啊毋就刁工講：「你彼碗糜食食e5呼，啊今也，這陣阮大家若擱貯糜去予你食，啊我才對伊來去。」啊我才講彼塊碗，毋通挵破，後擺阮通，通擱貯予我大家食啦。」安呢啦。

a i chiu7 kio3 in a-ma2, chu7 an2-ni in sin …… in tai7-ke bo5 ti7 teh, i chu7 an2-ni khi3 chhoe7 in a-ma2 lah, ka7 in a-ma2 hu7 tng2 lai5 se2 seng-khu lah, honnh, a m7 chiu7 thiau-kang kong2:  “li2 hit oann2 me5 chiah8-chiah8--e5 honnh, a chit-ma2, chit chun7 goan2 tai7-ke na7 koh toe2 be5 khi3 hou7 li2 chiah8, a goa2 chiah tui3 i lai5 khi3.”  a goa2 chiah kong2 hit te3 oann2, m7 thang long7 phoa3, au7-pai2 goan2 thang, thang koh toe2 hou7 goa2 tai7-ke chiah8 lah.” an2-ni lah.
in sim-pu7 an2-ni kong2, i chiu7 iu2-hau3.
